sub_title: Brand Builder | Leveling the playing field via LunamLabs (The Gamechangers NFT) & NoPausa | Ex P&G | Founder Lean In NL
summary:
Ex- P&G Director/ Femtech Founder / Web3 Founder / Non profit Founder / Mom of twin baby girls 

I'm a seasoned business leader with broad experience across a wide range of CPG categories, in marketing, commercial and general management-type roles. I have proven track record building brands, leading multifunctional teams and delivering on key business KPIs (revenue, share, profit, brand penetration and equity). 

After a decade at the biggest CPG company in the world, I was chosen among a selected group of talents to join startup generator Antler, where I combined my experience and my purpose to empower women, to build Baushe (previously Baubo.care) - a platform that aims to enable women to live at their best through menopause.

In 2021 I joined LunamLabs, as cofounder, to bring to life "The Gamechangers NFT" - a unique NFT collection made by women artists, featuring gamechanging women, with the purpose to fund women entrepreneurs. 

I also co-founded "Lean In Netherlands", the officially affiliated network to Lean In.org, which grew to a team of 35+ volunteers and a strong community. On this capacity, I'm often invited to talk at events, companies, podcasts or panels. 

Clifton strengths: WOO, Activator, Includer, Communicator, Significance 
MBTI: E.N.T.J

Motto: "It matters not how strait the gate, How charged with punishments the scroll, I am the master of my fate: I am the captain of my soul." [Invictus, W.E. Henley]

PS: I'm selective with my network, so I won't accept LinkedIn invitations without an introduction on the invite, without a good reason for us to connect; or from robots
